revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Zidoo |model=X9 |revision= |asin=B07DXJTY2F, B017H3HN48;UK; |is_manuf=No |manuf= |fcc_date=04/14/2016 |fcc_id=2AGN7-X9 |type=Android media player, media streamer |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MStar |cpu1_model=MSO9180;MSO9180D1R; |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=eMMC |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, HDMI |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_hdmi_num=2 |wi1_module=CT-UNITE ZK-7662 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7662U |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=TF Card slot, Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI in/out, TOSLINK/Analog Audio out, 4K, IR receiver, |stock_os=Android;4.4.2;(KitKat); |802dot11_protocols=abgn }} {{TagLine|Smart TV Box}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/index/model/X9/target/rdOqbsJTP8k%3D.html}}
"HDMI_4K_V1.3" and "2015 06 26" are silkscreened on the board in FCC photos.
*Although the [[CT-UNITE ZK-7662]] should support abgn+ac, FCC documents :for this product only cover 2.4GHz bgn and bluetooth and the product page :only claims 2.4GHz / 5.8GHz 802.11n.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[MStar]] MSO9180D1R @1.5GHz :Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A9 r4) *GPU: Octa Core Mali-450 *Flash: 8GB (eMMC), RAM: 2GB (DDR3) *WLAN: 802.11abgn (2.4/5GHz), BT 4.0 LE *Ethernet: 1x FE (10/100Mbps) RJ45 port *USB: 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0 ports *HDMI: Standard in/out HDMI 1.4b (female) *Resolution: 4K*2K and H.265 (HEVC) UHD *Operating System: Android 4.4.2 (KitKat)
===Models=== :;[https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/allProduct.html ''Zidoo'' product] *[[Zidoo X7]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/X7/target/apG5We1In1pKKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo X9]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/X9/target/rdOqbsJTP8k%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo X9S]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/X9S/target/rRwtRFydZ4xKKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo X10]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/X10/target/xqwZ8QMj6ZVKKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo Z9S]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/Z9S/target/2INlOr7QH%2B1KKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo Z9X]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/Z9X/target/VEMg6VRC2%2B9KKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo Z10]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/Z10/target/7kv1voas1D1KKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.] *[[Zidoo Z10 Pro]] • [https://www.zidoo.tv/Product/spec/model/Z10+PRO/target/7ogeLPHKQt1KKmVViAFMcQ%3D%3D.html Spec.]
